Msg1: GAME PAYS LEFT TO RIGHT & RIGHT TO LEFT !
betText: FREE GAMES ARE PLAYED AT THE TRIGGERING CREDIT BET
multipleTxt1: All PowerXStreams wins pay left- to - right and right - to - left, on adjacent reels starting with the leftmost or rightmost reel. The award is multiplied by the number of symbols that occur per reel in the winning combination. Only highest award is paid per PowerXStream combination.
multipleTxt2: At the start of each spin, a symbol is randomly chosen to be stacked on reel 2, 3 & 4
multipleTxt8: ALL SYMBOLS MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE FOR REPLACEMENT
maxNumTxt: MULTIPLE COMBINATIONS CAN OCCUR IN A SINGLE GAME. THE MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SPINS AWARDED IN A SINGLE GAME IS 128. FREE GAMES ARE PLAYED AT THE TRIGGERING CREDIT BET
additionalTxt: ADDITIONAL FREE SPINS CAN BE WON DURING FREE SPIN PLAY
COMB: In any combination left to right only
ADD: ADDITIONAL FREE SPINS CAN BE WON DURING FREE GAME PLAY!
ALL_WINS: ALL WINS DOUBLE DURING FREE SPINS
NO_JACKPOT: Jackpot cannot be won during Free Game Feature play.
SCATTER_AWARD: •Number of lines played and credits bet per line are the  same as the game that triggered the free spins •Scatter win are paid in addition to line wins • Malfunction voids all pays and plays
PRESS_BET_MAX: Press BET MAX to bet up to 60 credits.
WAYS_NOTE1: Bet level can be adjusted on the Game Settings window.
WAYS_NOTE2: Ways wins are combined and added
INFO:
576 ways to win

All wins shown in credits. Only highest paying PowerXStream combination for each symbol is paid per spin. Touch Wagered, Won, or Balance amounts on Info Bar to switch between credits and cash values.
Malfunction Voids All Pays and Plays
